backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing lead forms in a map with functions to submit and retrieve leads.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing domain configuration and deployment-related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend source files and configuration documents.
frontend/DEPLOYED_MAINNET.md: Template for recording live IC mainnet deployment details including domain, URL, and canister IDs.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining domain rules, requirements, and steps for deploying to IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, font preloads, and root mount for the React app.
frontend/project-domain.json: JSON file setting the required project domain to "techmarket-digital".
frontend/scripts/deploy-mainnet.sh: Mainnet deployment script validating domain, building frontend, and deploying canisters.
frontend/scripts/post-deploy-smoke-check: Checklist for verifying a successful mainnet deployment, covering UI, links, responsiveness, and backend behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React root component wrapping HomePage with theme support and notification toaster.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Renders the landing page footer with brand info, quick navigation buttons, and social links.
frontend/src/components/landing/Header.t: Implements a sticky header with logo, navigation links, CTAs, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/landing/LeadForm: Provides a lead capture form with validation, submission handling, and a success state.
frontend/src/components/landing/Motion.t: Adds intersection-based reveal animations to wrapped elements with optional delay.
frontend/src/components/landing/ProcessS: Displays a four-step marketing process using animated cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/landing/Sections: Defines major landing sections like hero, trust, and others using animated content and CTAs.
frontend/src/components/landing/Services: Shows a grid of service offerings with icons, descriptions, and motion effects.
frontend/src/components/landing/StickyCo: Renders floating WhatsApp and call buttons for quick contact access.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Stores contact numbers and generates WhatsApp and phone URLs.
frontend/src/content/homeCopy.ts: Provides copy text for landing sections like hero, services, trust, and CTAs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state tracking for authentication status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadForm.ts: Manages lead form state, validation, submission via backend actor, and success/error UI handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, typography, dark mode theming, and motion utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Assembles the homepage layout by rendering all landing sections and sticky contact components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, custom colors, animations, typography, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, architectural notes, and implemented feature tracking.
